title: 【1.11.2】服务器地图过大怎么办。如果有插件，请告知安装方法
txt_content:
【1.11.2】服务器地图过大怎么办。如果有插件，请告知安装方法
如题

玩家数量：30人
服务器地图4G了。这个大小正常吗？

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
可以使用WorldBorder来限制玩家跑图
https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/worldborder/

另外可以使用多世界插件生成一个新的世界定期重置，引导玩家在新的世界里跑图

另外4G不算大的感觉

replies.author: Black_White_
replies.txt_content:
若只保留建筑，那么你可以删除stats文件夹和players文件夹减少一些缓存
生存服还是创造服？4GB还不算很大，记得备份！

replies.txt_content:
1207414967 发表于 2017-4-1 09:28

PAGES
Changelog
Commands and Permissions
Further Information
Commands and Permissions
Table of Contents
Key: primary command <required value> [optional value]

Note that [worldname] is actually required in the commands below if run from the server console, but optional if run in-game by you as a player, as it then defaults to the world you're in if not specified.


/wb - list available commands like below (show help).

Permission: worldborder.help

设置边界
/wb set <radiusX> [radiusZ] - set world border of specified radius (in blocks), centered on you. Can only be run by an in-game player. If radiusZ isn't specified, the radiusX value will be used for both. 
/wb [worldname] set <radiusX> [radiusZ] <x> <z> - set border with the x and z coordinates of the center specified. 
/wb [worldname] set <radiusX> [radiusZ] spawn - set border with the world's spawn point used as the center. 
/wb set <radiusX> [radiusZ] player <playername> - set border centered on the specified player for the world they're currently in. 
/wb [worldname] setcorners <x1> <z1> <x2> <z2> - set a border based on corner coordinates from location (x1, z1) to (x2, z2).
裁剪多余的部分

/wb [worldname] trim [freq] [pad]

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
1207414967 发表于 2017-4-1 23:28
具体操作请问怎么弄？
关闭服务器，用MCE打开地图，选择区块模式，选择要删掉的区块，删掉，保存

记得备份地图

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content:
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/regionerator.12219/

闲置区块删除，可以设置多久没人到达的区块会被删除，默认被圈地的区块不会被删除，这个插件对于喜欢跑图的生存服务器比较理想、

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content: 删除的地方只要有人再次去会自动加载，不需要担心用了之后地图出现残缺之类的事情，这个相当于重置某个区块的状态，如果原来是千疮百孔的地方可以恢复到第一次加载的样子。

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
首先请楼主确认真的是地图过大，而不是其他东西(比如日志)刷屏导致的
打开世界文件夹\region，这是整个世界的区块文件，如果这个文件夹并不大请检查是哪个文件夹占用的空间
如果需要删除后重启即可
